heading: Frequently Asked Questions
subheading: Find answers to the most common questions about SeaNeB.

items.question: What is SeaNeB?
items.answer: SeaNeB (Search Near By) is a location-based local business discovery platform that helps MSMEs promote their deals, offers, and services to nearby customers at zero commission.

items.question: Is SeaNeB free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Browsing local deals and businesses on the SeaNeB app is 100% free for customers. Businesses can list their basic profile for free and choose from affordable paid plans for additional promotions.

items.question: Which cities are supported?
items.answer: SeaNeB is currently expanding across India. Check the app to see if your city is available, and if not, you can request coverage for your area.

items.question: How do I list my business on SeaNeB?
items.answer: Download the SeaNeB app, sign up as a customer, and then register your business from your profile page. Follow the on-screen steps to complete your business profile.

items.question: How does commission-free work?
items.answer: Unlike other platforms that charge a percentage of every sale or order, SeaNeB charges a flat subscription fee. You keep 100% of your earnings on every transaction or deal.

items.question: What types of promotions can I run?
items.answer: You can post discount offers, limited-time deals, service announcements, product highlights, and job listings directly through the SeaNeB business dashboard.

items.question: Do I need an account to browse offers?
items.answer: You need to log in with your mobile number to access all features. We don't store unnecessary personal data.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: You can request account deletion from within the app under Profile > Settings > Delete Account, or by emailing us at hello@seaneb.com.

items.question: How do I contact support?
items.answer: Visit our Contact page or email us at support@seaneb.com. We aim to respond within 24 business hours.

items.question: Where can I report a bug?
items.answer: You can report bugs through the in-app feedback option or by emailing support@seaneb.com with a description of the issue and your device details.
